oai_dc:dc.dc:title: CBC Students visit the Liberty Bell
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Students; College presidents; De La Salle Christian Brothers; Boys
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Brother Maurelian Sheel accompanied CBC students on a trip to New Orleans to see the Liberty Bell, which was one of the main attractions of the Cotton Centennial Exposition in New Orleans.
